channel.title: Npc Aggro?
channel.description:
Its been a while since I coded, and I can't remember how to change a NPC's aggro...
Anyone know how?

item.title: Npc Aggro?
item.dc:creator: @thanks_u thanks u
item.description:
@thanks_u wrote:

I Know … This is How I Do In My Source : This is how to add Npc Agression to monsters and which ones have
it already, so search in here the npc id before adding. Might already
be added. Okay here’s how to add

Tutiortal on how to add Npc Agression to Npcs

Go to Bulby > npcs > NPC.java
crtl + f and search —> private void checkNPC() {
Then add this

case 6222:
npcAggression(npcId);

The Case 6222 is the npc id, so switch 6222 to your npc id. That’s it

Npc’s that have Npc Agression at the moment

Please Rep If I Helped

Read full topic
